name: intellireadme
description: Generate professional, project-specific README files with AI (Groq) or smart templates. Users provide their own free API key for unlimited AI generation.

intelliReadme.groqApiKey.description: Your Groq API key for AI-powered README generation
intelliReadme.groqApiKey.markdownDescription: Get your **free** API key from [console.groq.com](https://console.groq.com). Sign up takes 2 minutes, no credit card required!

enumDescriptions: Moonshot AI - Best for comprehensive documentation (Recommended)
Llama 3.3 70B - Most capable model, detailed output
Llama 3.1 8B - Fastest response time, good quality
Gemma 2 9B - Google's efficient model, reliable results
intelliReadme.preferredModel.description: Preferred AI model for README generation
intelliReadme.preferredModel.markdownDescription: Choose the AI model that best fits your needs. **moonshotai/kimi-k2-instruct** is recommended for most projects.

intelliReadme.enableAI.description: Enable AI-powered README generation (requires API key)
intelliReadme.enableAI.markdownDescription: When enabled, shows AI generation option if API key is configured. Disable to use templates only.

enumDescriptions: Detailed README with all sections - best for most projects
Clean and concise README - essential sections only
Startup-focused with features and demo sections
Enterprise-grade with compliance and architecture sections
intelliReadme.templateStyle.description: Template style when using template generation
intelliReadme.templateStyle.markdownDescription: Choose the template style that matches your project type and audience.

intelliReadme.includeProjectStructure.description: Include detailed project folder structure in README
intelliReadme.includeProjectStructure.markdownDescription: When enabled, analyzes and includes your project's folder structure in the generated README.

intelliReadme.includeBadges.markdownDescription: Automatically generates badges for detected technologies like React, TypeScript, etc.

intelliReadme.autoDetectFramework.description: Automatically detect project framework and type
intelliReadme.autoDetectFramework.markdownDescription: Analyzes package.json and file structure to determine project type for better content generation.

commands.title: Generate README
commands.tooltip: Generate professional README with AI or templates

commands.title: Manage API Key
commands.tooltip: Add, update, or test your Groq API key

commands.title: Show Configuration Status
commands.tooltip: View current extension configuration and status

walkthroughs.title: ðŸš€ Get Started with IntelliREADME
walkthroughs.description: Learn how to generate amazing READMEs with AI or templates

steps.title: Open a Project
steps.description: Open any project folder to analyze

media.markdown: Open a project folder in VS Code to get started with README generation.

steps.title: Generate README
steps.description: Run the main command to start generation

media.markdown: Press `Ctrl+Shift+P` and type 'Generate README' or use the keyboard shortcut `Ctrl+Alt+R`
Choose between AI-powered generation (requires free API key) or instant template generation.

steps.title: Setup API Key (Optional)
steps.description: Get free API key for AI features

media.markdown: Visit [console.groq.com](https://console.groq.com) to get your free API key for unlimited AI-powered READMEs.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint

untrustedWorkspaces.description: IntelliREADME requires file system access to analyze project structure and generate documentation.
